Text: Re Merry ChristmasCharry Steve Haley and Will Sorry we are a bit late to send any christmas greetings but dont want to miss the occasion to send you all our best wishes for happiness health success and whatever you might wish for the coming millennium We have stayed here in Brie for Christmas this year and celebrated with the French part of the family The girls are on Christmas holiday and next week after a big party here on the th we will go down south to Provence to catch some sun rays Hope you are all well Cheerio Katharina Didier Julia and Mathilda PS I cut over half a meter of my hair which is very short now Original Message From Charry and Steve To SPchannelcom Sent Monday December AM Subject Merry Christmas Have a happy Christmas to you all From us SteveCharryHaley Wil

Re Merry ChristmasCharry Steve Haley and Will Sorry we are a bit late to send any christmas greetings but dont want to miss the occasion to send you all our best wishes for happiness health success and whatever you might wish for the coming millennium We have stayed here in Brie for Christmas this year and celebrated with the French part of the family The girls are on Christmas holiday and next week after a big party here on the th we will go down south to Provence to catch some sun rays Hope you are all well Cheerio Katharina Didier Julia and Mathilda PS I cut over half a meter of my hair which is very short now Original Message From Charry and Steve To SPchannelcom Sent Monday December AM Subject Merry Christmas Have a happy Christmas to you all From us SteveCharryHaley Wil
